# type

**Instance Property**

The type of data contained in the originating Model I/O buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: MDLMeshBufferType { get }
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ModelIO/MDLMeshBuffer] object can contain Model I/O mesh vertex data or submesh index data.

## Originating Objects

- **allocator**: The allocator object used to create this mesh buffer.
